ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectBritish Columbia Indemnity Interest Remission Order (HST)
PrecisBRITISH COLUMBIA INDEMNITY INTEREST REMISSION ORDER (HST) in order to provide for the remission to the Province of British Columbia of the interest payable by the Province in respect of its obligation under the Comprehensive Integrated Tax Coordination Agreement.
